channel.title: What's For Dinner
channel.description: These are your choices of what to eat tonight.

item.title: Braised Sea Cucumber
item.description: Gentle flavors of the sea that nourish and refresh you.

item.title: Baked Giblets with Salt
item.description: Rich giblet flavor infused with salt and spice.

item.title: Abalone with Marrow and Duck Feet
item.description: There's no mistaking the special pleasure of abalone.
